name: deepmood-fullstack
description: DeepMood - Emotion Detection and AI Chatbot

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Frontend built successfully. Backend will serve the static files.'
